title: Cinefantastique Vol 02 No 2 (Summer 1972)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Cover story on the Planet of the Apes franchise features interviews with the majority of the key players. Also includes interviews with Peter Cushing, Bruce Durn and director Douglas Trumbull (Silent Hill) and an on-set report from Dr. Phibes Rises Again with Vincent Price, Robert Quarry, Valli Kemp, and director Robert Fuest. Reviews include A Clockwork Orange, El Topo, ZPG, Year of the Cannibals and more.
